titleStmt.title: To GEORGE RUSSELL,George Russell (1828-98), of Swallowfield Park, Berks; barrister: see Pilgrim Letters 10, p. 241n. In the letter CD refers to the Garrick Club. 1 MAY 1863
titleStmt.bibl: Charles Dickens Letters Project, ed. Leon Litvack, Katie Brandt, Emily Bell, and Jeremy Parrott (London: Dickens Fellowship), DickensLetters.com.
